Container.Name: wh-mariadb11
Container.Overview: MariaDB Server is a high performing open source relational database, forked from MySQL.

Config.Name: MariaDB port
Config.Description: The TCP port MariaDB listens on.

Config.Name: MariaDB storage
Config.Description: The location where MariaDB stores its data.

Config.Name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable sets the MariaDB root password.

Config.Name: MARIADB_USER
Config.Description: This variable creates a default and a database with the same name.

Config.Name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
Config.Description: This variable sets the password for the created user.

Config.Name: MARIADB_DATABASE
Config.Description: This variable can define a different name for the default database created on the first start.
